title: Account Hacked, RP stolen
body: Hey guys, bought an RP card from game about a week ago now for 3750 RP (started with <100). Instantly bought snow day bard for 675 cause it was in my teemoing shop then didnt buy anything else. Logged in today and suddenly I only have 765RP left. Checked my purchase history, just snow day bard, then checked gifting history and it says I purchased gifts for some people called **[NAMES REDACTED]**. Obviously this was a hack, is there anything I can do about this???? I mean, it's the first time i bought RP so i went big and then i get buttfucked. Cheers

replies.body:
I had to remove the summoner name you listed because it toes the line of our [Universal Rules](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules) regarding *Naming and shaming/Witch hunting*. 

Anyway, we can help you out if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and provide as much information as possible about this. Let me know if you have any questions.
